title: Question 26
description: What tokens can I stake in the Liquidity Pool Incentivization program?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value: You have to stake the uniswapv2 LP tokens (USDC_BOND_UNI_LP). Youâ€™ll get them for providing liquidity to the [BOND/USDC pool](https://app.uniswap.org/#/add/0x0391d2021f89dc339f60fff84546ea23e337750f/0xa0b86991c6218b36c1d19d4a2e9eb0ce3606eb48) on Uniswap.
